Content: The suspects who are in remand custody over the shooting of the Chief Incumbent of Kirivehera in Kataragama the Ven. Kobawaka Dhamminda Thera have been further remanded. The seven suspects taken into custody over the shooting of the Chief Incumbent of Kirivehera in Katragama and injuring him were produced in the Tissamaharama Magistrate’s Court yesterday. The Tissamaharama Magistrate’s Court ordered them to be further remanded until the 18th of this month. Ven. Kobawaka Dhamminda Thera who received gunshot injuries to his abdomen and a hand is still receiving treatment at a private hospital in Colombo.
